Package pmdamora.natgeobackground

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • pmdamora.natgeobackground.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    The NatGeoBackground program downloads the current National Geographic photo of the day and sets it as the desktop background.
    Since:
    2017-09-21
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul D'Amora

      This method builds the full JSON url by adding the formatted date to the base url
      private static void changeDesktopBackground​(java.lang.String path)
      This method changes the user's desktop background to the image located at the specified path
      private static int chooseImageSize​(int[] sizeOptions)
      This method chooses an appropriate image size from a list of options based on which is closest to the user's display resolution.

      This method determines the exact file path of the downloaded image primarily based on the current date.

      This method takes the url of the image and downloads it to the user's filesystem in a specified location.

      This methods downloads and parses the provided JSON file, and locates the url of the appropriate image.

      • buildJSONUrl

        private static java.lang.String buildJSONUrl​(java.lang.String baseUrl)
        This method builds the full JSON url by adding the formatted date to the base url
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - The base of the url without the date
        Returns:
        The full url of the JSON file

      • chooseImageSize

        private static int chooseImageSize​(int[] sizeOptions)
        This method chooses an appropriate image size from a list of options based on which is closest to the user's display resolution.
        Parameters:
        sizeOptions - The available options for image size
        Returns:
        int This returns the chosen image width

      • getUrl

        private static java.lang.String getUrl​(java.lang.String jsonUrl,
                                       int displayWidth)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This methods downloads and parses the provided JSON file, and locates the url of the appropriate image.
        Parameters:
        jsonUrl - The base url string
        displayWidth - The width of user's display
        Returns:
        String This returns the url as a string.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on connection error

      • downloadImage

        private static java.lang.String downloadImage​(java.lang.String strImageUrl)
        This method takes the url of the image and downloads it to the user's filesystem in a specified location.
        Parameters:
        strImageUrl - The url location of the image
        Returns:
        String This returns the file path of the downloaded image

      • changeDesktopBackground

        private static void changeDesktopBackground​(java.lang.String path)
        This method changes the user's desktop background to the image located at the specified path
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the image to be used

      • createFilePath

        private static java.lang.String createFilePath​()
